name: Root Sector
description: The northern hub of Netgrid where all data threads originate.

name: Pulse Sector
description: A vibrant region of constant data flow and rhythmic energy.

name: Echo Sector
description: A mysterious area where data reverberates and secrets are hidden.

name: Void Sector
description: An empty expanse where data is scarce and silence prevails.

name: Core Sector
description: The central nexus of Netgrid, where all sectors converge.

name: Fractal Sector
description: A sector of infinite complexity and recursive patterns.

name: Quantum Sector
description: A sector where data exists in multiple states and possibilities.

name: Neon Sector
description: A brightly lit area filled with vibrant data streams and connections.

name: Shadow Sector
description: A dark and enigmatic region where data lurks in the shadows.

name: Horizon Sector
description: A sector on the edge of Netgrid, where new data and connections are discovered.
